message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get $60, you get $40. Deal?
I think I deserve a bit more, 55-45 is still quite fair!
The value is decreasing Bob, let's settle this. I'll take my previous offer of $55.
Inflation is eating into my share, I need a bit more to make up for it!
Bob, let's stop wasting time. We'll split it down the middle: $50 each. Take it or leave it.
